content.text: I love to draw other people. I like to mountain bike and I like to eat hard boiled eggs. I love people with a sense of humor.
I play in a NFL fantasy football league. I like NFL and college football. My favorite fiction genres are sci fi and horror. I love to read fiction books. I am a Georgia resident.
That's cool. I'm a bit of a sports fan myself. I like to watch football, but I'm not very good at playing it. I'm also a big reader. I love sci fi and horror novels.
Nice! I'm glad to meet another sports fan. I'm a huge Georgia Bulldogs fan. I love watching them play football.
Me too! They're having a great season this year. I'm hoping they can make it to the playoffs.
Me too! I'm sure they'll do it. They're a really talented team.
I hope you're right. It would be great to see them play in the Super Bowl.
Me too! That would be awesome.
So, what are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book called "The Martian." It's a sci fi novel about a man who gets stranded on Mars.
Oh, I've heard good things about that book. I've been meaning to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch football, and play video games.
Nice! I like to read, mountain bike, and draw.
That's cool. I've always wanted to learn how to mountain bike.
It's a lot of fun. You should give it a try.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem.
So, what's your favorite thing to do?
I love to draw. I love the feeling of creating something new.
That's cool. I love to read. I love the feeling of getting lost in a good book.
I know what you mean. There's nothing quite like it.
I agree.
